meanings.definition: To surpass in figures or calculations.
meanings.sent1: She always outfigures her classmates in math competitions.
meanings.sent2: His score outfigures all the others in the class.
meanings.sent3: The calculator tried to outfigures her, but she was too quick.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outfigures any obstacle in her way.
meanings.sent5: The champion's skill outfigures all others in the tournament.

meanings.definition: To exceed in numerical value or amount.
meanings.sent1: The sales of the new product outfigures the previous year's numbers.
meanings.sent2: Her savings outfigures her monthly expenses.
meanings.sent3: The number of balloons she bought outfigures the ones at the party last week.
meanings.sent4: His generosity outfigures anyone I know.
meanings.sent5: The mountain's height outfigures any other peak in the range.
